item.description:
随着投资者转向人工智能，2024年气候技术的股权融资出现下滑，这预示着新兴的去碳化努力将面临一场艰苦的战斗。【原文：

item.title: 奇货可居：另一场住房可负担性冲击即将来临（播客）
item.description: 通货膨胀和生活成本普遍居高不下的主要原因之一是住房价格。无论是买房还是租房，住房都非常昂贵。值得庆幸的是，在过去的一年里，我们所看到的一些房租价格上涨已经明显放缓，我们离科维德事件之前的速度已经不远了。坏消息是，这种情况可能不会持续太久。各种因素正在交织在一起，可能会对住房可负担性造成又一次冲击。在本期节目中【原文：One of the primary drivers of elevated inflation — and the high cost of living in general — is the price of shelter. Whether you’re buying or renting, housing is very expensive. Thankfully, over the last year, some of the increases we’ve seen in rent prices have slowed significantly, and we’re not too far away from the pre-Covid pace. The bad news is that this might not last. A confluence of factors is coming together that may cause yet another shock to housing affordability. On this episode of】

item.title: 英国滋补品制造商与 Molson Coors 签订协议后，Fevertree 业绩大涨
item.description: 在美国酿酒商 Molson Coors Beverage Co. 同意收购这家滋补品和混合饮料生产商的股份后，Fevertree Drinks Plc 大涨。【原文：Fevertree Drinks Plc surged after US brewer Molson Coors Beverage Co. agreed to buy a stake in the tonic and mixer maker.】

item.title: 日本央行副总裁发出信号：实际利率为负值，加息空间更大
item.description: 日本央行副行长绯野良三表示，即使上周加息，日本的实际利率仍明显处于负值，如果经济前景得以实现，日本央行将继续加息。【原文：Japan’s real rates clearly remain in negative territory even with last week’s interest rate hike, and the Bank of Japan will keep raising rates if its economic outlook is realized, according to Deputy Governor Ryozo Himino.】

item.title: 通胀保持稳定，赞比亚将暂停加息
item.description: 随着去年干旱和克瓦查大幅贬值的影响开始消散，赞比亚 1 月份的年通货膨胀率持平。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation rate flatlined in January as the impact of last year’s drought and a steep depreciation in the kwacha began dissipating.】

item.title: 菲律宾总统马科斯寻求与特朗普会面讨论移民问题
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯（Ferdinand Marcos Jr.）表示，他希望与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）会面讨论移民政策，因为有报道称一些菲律宾人面临被驱逐出境的风险。【原文：Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. said he wants to meet with US President Donald Trump to discuss immigration policy amid reports that some Filipinos are at risk of deportation.】

item.title: DeepSeek 跃居前列，印度竞相打造自己的人工智能模型
item.description: 随着政府与研究人员、初创企业和公司合作创建基础人工智能模型，印度正在人工智能领域奋起直追。【原文：India is racing to catch up in AI as the government engages researchers, startups and companies to create foundational artificial intelligence models.】

item.title: 增长乏力，匈牙利经济走出衰退
item.description: 匈牙利经济在去年年底摆脱了衰退，但其增长势头远未达到预期，这使得总理维克多-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）在一年多后的关键选举前实现强劲增长的计划变得更加复杂。【原文：The Hungarian economy climbed out of recession at the end of last year though it was far from gaining momentum, complicating Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s plans to generate strong growth before crucial elections in a little over a year’s time.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡寻求降低电费，阿达尼重新规划风电项目
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，在斯里兰卡新政府寻求降低电价之后，阿达尼集团正在重新评估在斯里兰卡建设风力发电项目的可行性，这标志着亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼的海外扩张计划遇到了新的障碍。【原文：Adani Group is remapping the viability of building wind power projects in Sri Lanka after the new government sought lower tariffs, people familiar with the matter said, marking a fresh obstacle in billionaire Gautam Adani’s overseas expansion plans.】

item.title: 乐天放弃在东京证券交易所上市证券部门的计划
item.description: 乐天集团（Rakuten Group Inc.【原文：Rakuten Group Inc. said it no longer plans to list its securities arm on the Tokyo Stock Exchange, and will instead focus on deepening its partnership with Mizuho Securities Co.】

item.title: 利润率提高，H&M 第四季度利润超出预期
item.description: Hennes & Mauritz AB 公布的第四季度利润好于预期，因为首席执行官 Daniel Erver 为这家瑞典快速时尚零售商制定的扭亏为盈战略开始见效。【原文：Hennes & Mauritz AB posted better-than-expected fourth-quarter profit, as Chief Executive Officer Daniel Erver’s turnaround strategy for the Swedish fast-fashion retailer starts to pay off.】

item.title: 业务部门陷入困境，英国电信第三季度收入下降
item.description: 英国电信集团公司（BT Group Plc）的业务部门陷入困境，拖累了第三财季的销售额，该公司正准备分拆该部门。【原文：BT Group Plc’s struggling business segment dragged down sales in the third fiscal quarter as the company prepares to carve out the unit.】

item.title: 利润下降，壳牌继续通过额外借款进行回购
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）在油价疲软导致利润降幅超过预期的情况下，继续通过增加借款来加快股票回购步伐。【原文：Shell Plc maintained the pace of its share buybacks with additional borrowing as profit dropped more than expected on weaker oil prices.】

item.title: 中国企业将在坦桑尼亚建造价值 20 亿美元的铁路连接镍矿
item.description: 坦桑尼亚与两家中国公司签署了一项价值 21.5 亿美元的协议，将修建一条铁路，将其主要港口达累斯萨拉姆与邻国布隆迪的一个镍矿连接起来。【原文：Tanzania signed a $2.15 billion deal with two Chinese firms to construct a railway linking its main port of Dar es Salaam to a nickel mine in neighboring Burundi.】

item.title: Netflix 发布印度最新热门大片《普什帕》续集
item.description: Netflix 公司将于本周四上映印度最新热门影片《普什帕 2：规则》，这是该美国流媒体服务公司如何利用印度大片的全球吸引力的又一例证。【原文：Netflix Inc. releases India’s latest hit film Pushpa 2: The Rule on Thursday, another example of how the US-based streaming service is leveraging the global appeal of Indian blockbusters.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将再次落后，英镑下滑
赛诺菲计划回购 50 亿欧元股票，预计利润增长将更快
item.description: 赛诺菲表示，今年将回购 50 亿欧元（52 亿美元）的股票，并加快利润增长速度，因为这家制药商将从消费者健康领域转向专注于快速增长的药物，如 RSV 疫苗。【原文：Sanofi said it will repurchase €5 billion ($5.2 billion) of stock and grow profits faster this year as the drugmaker pivots away from consumer health to focus on fast-growing drugs like its RSV shot.】

item.title: 德意志银行首席财务官称债券交易势头不减
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的交易业务在第四季度创下历史新高，到 2025 年为止，这一势头仍在继续。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG is seeing the momentum that fueled a record fourth quarter for its trading business continue into 2025 so far.】

item.title: 政治动荡削弱信心，法国经济萎缩
item.description: 由于巴黎奥运会的利好效应逐渐减弱，加上政府垮台挫伤了企业和消费者的信心，法国经济在去年年底出现萎缩。【原文：France’s economy contracted at the end of last year as tailwinds from the Paris Olympics faded and a government collapse bruised confidence among businesses and consumers.】

item.description:

。【原文：

item.title: 罗氏预计利润增长将超过销售额，大单在即
item.description: 罗氏控股公司（Roche Holding AG）表示，由于这家瑞士制药商努力控制研究成本，并寻求交易以建立其实验药物管线，今年的利润可能将超过销售额的增长。【原文：Roche Holding AG said profit will probably outpace sales growth this year as the Swiss drugmaker works to keep research costs in check and looks for deals to build its pipeline of experimental medicines.】

item.title: 公司推迟网络升级，诺基亚预计利润减少
item.description: 由于电信运营商未能升级其移动网络，诺基亚预计利润将低于去年。【原文：Nokia expects to make less profit than last year as telecommunications operators failed to upgrade their mobile networks.】

item.title: 沙特经济创 2022 年以来最快季度增速
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯第四季度的经济增长速度是自 2022 年以来最快的，原因是沙特王国实施了数十亿美元的经济多元化战略，扩大了非石油部门。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s economy grew in the fourth quarter at the quickest pace since 2022 as the non-oil sector expands under the kingdom’s multi-billion dollar strategy to diversify the economy.】

item.title: 德意志银行本季度交易蓬勃发展，但成本增加
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的固定收益交易员在去年第四季度创下了历史最佳业绩，因为他们从与 11 月美国大选和欧洲政治动荡有关的波动中获益匪浅。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG’s fixed-income traders closed out last year with the best fourth quarter on record as they benefited from volatility tied to the US elections in November and turbulence in European politics.】

item.title: 数据中心拉动电力需求，ABB订单激增
item.description: 由于电力需求旺盛的数据中心推动了这家瑞士制造商电气化业务的增长，ABB 有限公司的订单在第四季度有所增加。【原文：ABB Ltd.’s orders rose in the fourth quarter, as demand for power hungry data centers drives growth in the Swiss manufacturer’s electrification business.】

item.title: 壳牌与 Thebe 接近达成价值 10 亿美元的南非石油资产销售协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，壳牌公司（Shell Plc）及其南非合作伙伴即将结束估值纠纷，为以高达 10 亿美元的价格出售这家石油巨头在当地的下游资产铺平道路。【原文：Shell Plc and its South African partner are close to ending a valuation dispute, paving the way for the sale of the oil giant’s local downstream assets for as much as $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 本田和日产 2024 年销量下滑，加强了捆绑合作的理由
item.description: 2024 年，本田汽车公司和日产汽车公司的全球汽车销量都出现了停滞或下降，这凸显了这两家公司合并并阻止其市场份额下滑的必要性。【原文：Honda Motor Co. and Nissan Motor Co. both saw global vehicle sales stagnate or fall in 2024, underscoring the need for the pair to combine and arrest their sliding market shares.】

item.title: 北欧联合银行第四季度净利息收入超出预期
item.description: 北欧联合银行（Nordea Bank Abp）公布的第四季度净利息收入好于预期，其核心业务在利率下降的情况下表现出了韧性。【原文：Nordea Bank Abp reported better-than-expected net interest income in the fourth quarter with its core business demonstrating resilience in the face of declining interest rates.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行加强对澳大利亚养老基金流动性风险的审查
item.description: 澳大利亚央行正密切关注与该国快速增长的 4.1 万亿澳元（约合 2.6 万亿美元）养老金行业相关的潜在金融冲击，并与监管机构共同研究多种方案。【原文：Australia’s central bank is honing its focus on potential financial shocks linked to the nation’s fast-growing A$4.1 trillion ($2.6 trillion) pensions industry, and working through multiple scenarios with regulators.】
